# Create the Crabs team

In this section you create a new team in __Tercen__.


Once logged in you see your __personal page__, similar to the image below.

<center><img src="images/View_personal_page.png"></center>

* Click on `Teams`

<center><img src="images/Click_on_teams_tab.png"></center>

* Click on `+ New team`

<center><img src="images/Click_on_add_team.png"></center>

* Enter `Crabs team` in the `Name` tab
* Click `OK`

You have now created a team, it is located in your teams list.

<center><img src="images/View_new_crab_team.png"></center>

The next section you create a project within the team.
